sentences.sContent: Nature reserves were set up around new power stations to mollify local conservationists.
sentences.sCn: 新的发电站附近建立了自然保护区，以安抚当地的自然环境保护主义者。

synos.tran: 平息，缓和；使…平静；使…变软

remMethod.val: moll (软) + ify (使) → 使矛盾软化 → 平息

trans.tranOther: to make someone feel less angry and upset about something
